name: Pillow Fight The Game
description:
Pillow Fight is a fun little indie game made by Chris Komlódy

It's 100% Free, no payment requierd, but if you want to support me just toss me some sweet bucks :)

Features

  • 5 Game Modes
  • Singleplayer
  • Local Multiplayer
  • Full Controller Support
  • Over 30 Hats
  • 6 Weapons

Pillows are alive and they are fighting with each other with weapons for no explainable reason. Be the coolest pillow in town and kill everybody that's stands in your way! One of your friend can help with the fights as well.
